alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wayne, Cayuga and southwestern Oswego Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clyde, or 13 miles north of Waterloo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Lyons, Clyde, Sodus, Cato, Battle Island State Park, Sterling, Rose, Ira, Huron, Conquest, Savannah, Wolcott, Minetto, Hannibal, Red Creek, Meridian, South Hannibal and Furniss. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized ponding of water. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
